    • restartPong

      public void restartPong(VirtualServer server, VirtualView client, Client clientContainer)
      Restarts the pong mechanism with the given server, client, and client container.
      Parameters:
      server - the VirtualServer instance
      client - the VirtualView instance
      clientContainer - the Client instance which contains the common implementations between VirtualViews
